question: When did FDA approve the first B-cell maturation antigen-targeted CAR-T cell therapy?
ideal_answer: FDA approved the first B-cell maturation antigen-targeted CAR-T cell therapy on March 26, 2021.

snippets.text: The most recent US Food and Drug Administration approval of the first B-cell maturation antigen-targeted CAR-T cell therapy on March 26, 2021, has paved a path forward for the eventual evaluation of more of these investigational agents undergoing clinical trials.
